# **About me**

I am a bioinformatician and dedicated scientist interested in (post-) transcriptional RNA regulation and cancer biology. My passion is the visualization and integration of high-throughput data. My professional goal is to analyze findings from multiple perspectives and angles, with the aim to positively impact patients' lives.
